sentences.en: British Asians have begun a campaign calling for an end to discrimination.

sentences.en: Discrimination by employers on the grounds of race and nationality was illegal.

sentences.en: Eventually, he came face to face with discrimination again.
sentences.cn: 最终，他又一次遭遇歧视。

sentences.en: Racial discrimination is abhorrent to my council and our staff.

sentences.en: The Sex Discrimination Act has not eliminated discrimination in employment.
sentences.cn: 《反性别歧视法》并未根除工作中的歧视。

sentences.en: They cooked without skill and ate without discrimination.

sentences.en: They focus on overt discrimination rather than insidious aspects of racism.
sentences.cn: 他们关注的是公开的歧视，而不是种族主义的一些潜在问题。

sentences.en: They knew that discrimination was going on, but chose to ignore it.
